Bryan Adams danes praznuje 60. rojstni dan
05 Nov 2019, 09:01 by STA

Kanadski glasbenik Bryan Adams danes praznuje 60. rojstni dan. Z glasbo se je začel resneje ukvarjati sredi 70. let, v začetku 80. je s tretjim albumom Cuts Like a Knife zaslovel v Severni Ameriki, svetovno slavo pa mu je leta 1984 prinesla četrta plošča Reckless. Marca letos je izdal najnovejši album Shine A Light, ki ga predstavlja na turneji.



Kanadski glasbenik Bryan Adams danes praznuje 60. rojstni dan. Foto: Vir: Wikipedia

TORONTO > Pevec, tekstopisec, kitarist in producent s pravim imenom Bryan Guy Adams velja za enega najbolje prodajanih kanadskih glasbenikov vseh časov. Rodil se je britansko-kanadskim imigrantom v Kingstonu v kanadski provinci Ontario, prvo pogodbo z založbo pa je leta 1978 podpisal za dolar. "Pogodbe morajo imeti vrednost, ki velja naprej in nazaj, da so zakonite. Ker mi niso želeli dati denarja, je bil dolar minimalni znesek, da je bila pogodba pravno zavezujoča," je leta 2015 povedal za revijo Rolling Stone.
Album Reckless, ki mu je prinesel globalni sloves, je bil po pisanju omenjene revije prvi album kanadskega umetnika, ki je v domači državi dosegel milijon prodanih izvodov, poleg tega je bil dva tedna številka ena na ameriški Billboardovi lestvici, šest pesmi pa se je uvrstilo med 15 najboljših singlov. Na njem so uspešnice, kot so Run to You, Heaven, Summer of 69 in It's Only Love v duetu s Tino Turner. Prav te je leta 2014 obudil pred slovenskimi poslušalci v Stožicah, kjer se je ustavil v sklopu turneje ob 30. obletnici albuma.
Letno izvede več kot 100 koncertov. Trenutno je na turneji Shine A Light, na kateri predstavlja istoimenski studijski album, 14. po vrsti. Začel jo je maja v Severni Ameriki, prvi koncert v Evropi pa ima napovedan v petek v Celovcu. V Ljubljani je nazadnje koncertiral novembra lani v sklopu turneje The Ultimate Tour. Adams se posveča tudi fotografiji, filantropiji in aktivizmu. Fotografija mu pomeni vzporedno kariero. Napravil je portrete vplivnih ameriških žensk, britanskih pevk, med njimi Amy Winehouse, s katero je tudi prijateljeval. Njegove podobe rock zveznikov in manekenk redno objavljajo modne revije, kot so Vogue, Interview in Zoo. Predstavil jih je tudi na številnih razstavah, poleg tega je s fotografskimi knjigami zbiral sredstva za različne namene, denimo za vojne ranjence in za raziskave o raku dojk.



Svojo največjo uspešnico, (Everything I Do) I Do It For You, nastalo za film Robin Hood: Princ tatov iz leta 1991, je ustvaril v manj kot uri. Za to je moral "tekmovati" z Annie Lennox, Kate Bush in Petrom Cetero. A je skladatelj glasbe za film Michael Kamen presodil, da Adams s svojim glasom premore dovolj robatosti, da bo balada prepričljiva in romantična, ne da bi postala pocukrana, navaja Rolling Stone.
text:
Bryan Adams celebrates his 60th birthday today
05 Nov 2019, 09:01 by STA

Canadian musician Bryan Adams celebrates his 60th birthday today. He began making music more seriously in his mid-70s, making his third album, Cuts Like a Knife, in North America in the early '80s, and his worldwide fame in 1984 came with his fourth record, Reckless. In March of this year, he released his latest album Shine A Light, which he presents on tour.



Canadian musician Bryan Adams celebrates his 60th birthday today. Photo: Source: Wikipedia

TORONTO> Bryan Guy Adams, singer, songwriter, guitarist and producer of the real name, is considered one of the best-selling Canadian musicians of all time. He was born to British-Canadian immigrants in Kingston, Ontario, Canada, and signed his first record deal in 1978 for a dollar. "Contracts must have a value that goes back and forth to be legal. Because they didn't want to give me money, the dollar was the minimum amount that the contract was legally binding," he told Rolling Stone magazine in 2015.
The Reckless album, which earned him worldwide fame, was the first Canadian artist to make one million copies sold in his home country, according to the magazine, as well as being number one on the US Billboard chart for two weeks, with six songs on the chart among the top 15 singles. It features hits such as Run to You, Heaven, Summer of 69 and It's Only Love in a duet with Tina Turner. It was in 2014 that he awakened you to Slovene listeners in Stozice, where he stopped as part of a tour to mark the album's 30th anniversary.
He performs over 100 concerts annually. He is currently touring Shine A Light, on which he presents his studio album of the same name, the 14th in a row. Started in May in North America, the first concert in Europe is scheduled for Friday in Klagenfurt. He last performed in Ljubljana last November as part of The Ultimate Tour. Adams also dedicates himself to photography, philanthropy and activism. Photography means a parallel career to him. He made portraits of influential American women, British singers, including Amy Winehouse, with whom he also made friends. His images of rock celebs and mannequins are regularly published by fashion shows such as Vogue, Interview and Zoo. He has also presented them at numerous exhibitions, collecting funds for photography for various purposes, such as war wounded women and breast cancer research.



He created his biggest hit, Everything I Do, I Made It For You, for the 1991 movie Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves, in less than an hour. For that, he had to "compete" with Annie Lennox, Kate Bush, and Peter Cetero. But the music composer for the movie, Michael Kamen, surmised that Adams had enough of his voice to be rugged enough to make the ballad convincing and romantic without getting knocked over, Rolling Stone states.
